desc: Please use CLING in various places.(Corona virus prevent) There are a wide range of sterilization effects such as germs, fungi, and viruses. HOCL(Cling) is an antibacterial substance produced in white blood cells. There is an advantage in safety over general sterilizers. 99.9% Sanitizing. Made safe for the human body.
